__e: Friends, these gentlemen are from the federal government.
Those men were sent to you by el presidente himself.
The people from Judge Nicastro's court are waiting for you in the conference room.
Those men were sent to you by el presidente himself.
We were sent by Him who is called I Am!
Well, I imagine one or two of these gentlemen were sent here by you.
Sooner or later they're killed off or sent to prison... until he's the only one left.
That's why I've already moved them to a safe house.
- First of all, we had sex at the last minute, right before we got married.
But it was your decision that sent them down the left hallway and not the right, out the front door and not the back.
Isn't that why your parents sent you to this country too?
My mother and father... You took them away through that thing, and now it is gone.
The only ones immediately sent to death and reduced to ashes.
- It's these two brothers who get sent to war and--
All the people I've sent to die.
Apologies, I know nothing of your son, nor others sent to you in my place.
And thanks so much, the rest of you, for all the flowers and...food and...cards that you sent my family.
He's been sending 'em to all of us since he got that new phone.
The government sent them to find out what happened to those boys.
The elders sent us to see you and your family
I do not understand why it sent us here.
- Who? Whoever sent us here: time...
Every single one of them, including your son, would still be alive if you hadn't sent us down here.
